lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya, who recently left Formula One, made his stock car debut yesterday, overcoming an early accident to finish third in the ARCA race at Talladega (Ala.) Superspeedway. Montoya had started second and led the first nine laps. Frank Kimmel won the scheduled 92-lap race, which was called because of darkness 14 laps from the finish.
